title: Truly the only place to stay for a real Con Dao experience
text:
Travel Articles | October 15, 2015 
Beautiful beaches and hidden lagoons are also to be found here, with very few tourists Con Dao is a paradise off the beaten track. 
Con Dao Resort offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. Top features of the hotel include free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking, car park, room service. Con Dao Resort previously known as hostel Union is equivalent to 3 star resort with private beaches and fine sand stretching over 2km very fresh and clean. From Con Son Airport (Co Ong) on the Con Dao Resort just over 20min. Con Dao Resort is located conveniently in the heart of the town of Con Dao is located on Nguyen Duc Thuan and in the large campus is surrounded by ranges of non-labor & Counselor cool green coconut.Experience high quality room facilities during your stay here. Some rooms include complimentary tea, towels, slippers, complimentary instant coffee, sofa, provided to help guests recharge after a long day. The hotel offers many unique recreational opportunities such as private beach, golf course (on site), outdoor pool, pool (kids), tennis courts. Discover an engaging blend of professional service and a wide array of features at Con Dao Resort. 
A converted French style villa with a decent spread of facilities, ATC - Con Dao Resort is well placed near the town centre and directly along the beach. Should you want to venture away from the private rooms, large pool and business centre, bicycles and cars are available to rent. 
Overlooking Con Dao Sea, ATC Con Dao Resort is a single-story French villa offering free parking and rooms with cable TV channels. An outdoor swimming pool and 24-hour front desk is available. ATC Resort is located in the center of Con Dao Island. Places of interest such as Chuong Cop Jail and Con Dao Museum are approximately 7.5 miles away. ATC Con Dao Resortâ€™s basic and clean rooms offer private bathrooms with toiletries and a hairdryer. 
Free WiFi, TVs, and hair dryers are featured in all 60 rooms. Minibars provide refreshments, and room service makes dining in an option. Nice touches to enhance your stay include slippers and free toiletries.The restaurant, Lotus, serves international cuisine and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. For a drink, you can stop by the resort's own bar/lounge. Enjoy the seasonal outdoor swimming pool, kids' swimming pool, and pool loungers as well as access to bike rentals. Additionally, you'll find free WiFi in public areas and laundry facilities. Free breakfast is available daily. There's also the convenience of an airport shuttle.
